revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=AboCom |model=WR5204 |revision= |asin= |fcc_date=04/10/2009 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MQ4WR5204 |pcb_id=M01-WR524-X20 |pwr_v=3.3 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-70G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:12:0E |oui_eth=00:12:0E }} {{TagLine|802.11b/g/n Portable Router}} :[http://www.abocom.com.tw/download_show.aspx?ptype=66395a7ea68b3cb8a3e548690eb0df8a&id=70CDEDA2DBACD334D45210DCABDF2EAD Downloads]
"M01-WR524-X20" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The sample SSID shown in the FCC manual is '''RT3052_AP''' :Tag line, OUI are per a marketplace (eBay) label.
*[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=28041 ''AboCom WR5204'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] {{See also|Planex MZK-MF150}}
